Detailed Description

Represents a B-spline surface.

MBAsplineSurface - Spline surface parameters (e.g., for storing on database) One of the constructors of MBA takes this object.

Author:
Øyvind Hjelle <Oyvind.Hjelle@math.sintef.no>
